hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveBankruptFo.NAME: Bankrupt Form
hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveBankruptFo.DESCRIPTION: Lose all your gold. NL Whenever you would lose gold gain that much gold instead up to !M!.

hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveBatonStrik.NAME: Baton Strike
hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveBatonStrik.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When sent to another player gains !M! damage.

hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveCoinPelt.NAME: Coin Pelt
hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveCoinPelt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and lose 10 minus !M!, (minimum of 2), Gold. Repeat for every 100 gold you have.

hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveDeadlyMerc.NAME: Deadly Merchandise
hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveDeadlyMerc.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage if it's been sent through the Courier.

hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveEnforceKee.NAME: Enforced Keep
hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveEnforceKee.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have not played this card this combat gain !M! Gold.

hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveFinancialF.NAME: Financial Forefront
hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveFinancialF.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are on the highest floor of all players gain that much gold.

hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveMisplacedC.NAME: Misplaced Coinpurse
hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveMisplacedC.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, gain !M! Gold.

hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveSafetyNet.NAME: Safety Net
hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveSafetyNet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains double block if it's been sent through the Courier.

hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveTightInves.NAME: Tight Investment
hyperbolicOverthrall:executiveTightInves.DESCRIPTION: Pay 20 gold. NL When removed from your deck gain your gold back with interest.
